name: SWS WordPress Tweaks
upgrade_notice: Keeping up with the lastest version means fewer errors.
author: Sharon Stromberg

sections.description:
This plugin is a repository for tweaks that I want to make to most or all of my sites. At present, it includes...
  • Increase default max upload size
  • Fix bug in password reset message
  • Fix bug in iThemes Security font path
  • Disable new user notifications
  • Disable password change notifications
  • Disable xml-rpc
  • Add server tag to bottom of Home and About pages
